txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Albino skin from beasts and worms surrounding Sûri-kylä. Deliver the items to Kaleva at the Lossoth capital.
'We shall find many uses for these, of this I am certain. Thank you.'
'We often use the skin from the worms and beasts for our clothing and armour.'
A Lossoth, Kaleva, at Sûri-kylä is collecting albino skin at the Lossoth capital.
Deliver the albino skin to Kaleva at Sûri-kylä in Forochel
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver albino skin from the beasts and worms surrounding Sûri-kylä in Forochel. The items are to be delivered to Kaleva at the Lossoth capital.
Wanted: Albino skin from beasts and worms surrounding Sûri-kylä.
